review: I've had Fire Stick for about a month it works great! Remote is easy to use. Would buy another.

review: Still trying to figure out what all the  options are and how much extra they cost.

review: So magical you'd think it was crafted by Keebler Elves to solve our flawed human world problems.

review: Shipped quickly.  Very user friendly device.

review: Very pleased with the Fire TV Stick
author: Garland Alcorn

review: I was very disappointed with the Firestick. It was not advertised that you had to purchase movies. Only that you could stream free. Real big issue with me. I love Amazon  but you need to make it clear that you must buy the better movies.
author: S.A. McCaffrey

review: Really easy setup and excellent performance.
author: TOP "TOP"

review: I love this thing. So easy to use and install.
author: CASSANDRA J. TRICE
